title: Constructivist-Based Mathematics Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Development of applied mathematical skills to enhance data-driven decision-making competencies for corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80% or higher accuracy through constructivist learning activities based on real work scenarios.
Learners can propose three or more methods for applying mathematical concepts to work environments through collaborative online discussions and project tasks.
Learners can improve their motivation and immersion in math learning by 20% or more compared to pre-assessment through self-directed learning planning and execution.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Discussion Board, Assignment Submission Features)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
